result.arabic_text: يَٰيَحۡيَىٰ خُذِ ٱلۡكِتَٰبَ بِقُوَّةٖۖ وَءَاتَيۡنَٰهُ ٱلۡحُكۡمَ صَبِيّٗا
result.translation: 12. Nabii Yacya yoobokeeh barak tu edde raaqisa caddo yoofe waqdi yacyaw tawraat kitab maqarruk ibbixaay elle taamit, Kaadu nanu nubuwwannuuy turraqsaay fula-le kas kaah necee usuk qunxa awkah anuk iyye Yalli.
